column4: I am having trouble with getting swat up and running. Can someone provide some guidance?
it's a lot more likely you'll get help if you include useful information in the initial question
e.g. what isn't working, how you installed, what you've tried
no return I just get the prompt back
'sudo /etc/init.d/inetd start', then run the netstat command again
tail: l: invalid number of lines
sorry to be dence... but I am not sure what to do with your last comment
